modName: The Legend of Zelda Return of a Hero
summary:
This mod aims to rebuild the World from The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time. The Story will
play after the action from OoT, when Link died and finaly a new Hero of time was born. The
style of this mod will be an mixture of OoT and TP, I try to aim for an realistic Style with
an touch of fantasy.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/35ld7jr.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/288vygx.jpg[/img]

[size=+2][color=red]Because of the lack in interrest here, I will close down the Modification. I uploaded mostly all Progress now to this webside. To get it to work correctly, you maybe need to make a duplicate from the The Zelda Projekt.bsa and call it Hylian.bsa. so you have two .bsa´s . No more support from my side. Get to Hyrule with the Cheat: cow ZeldaWorld 0 0[/color][/size]

This mod aims to rebuild the World from The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time. The Story will
play after the action from OoT, when Link died and finaly a new Hero of time was born. The
style of this mod will be an mixture of OoT and TP, I try to aim for an realistic Style with
an touch of fantasy.

At the moment we can only release a small Lost Woods Demo!

[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/29xyhld.jpg[/img]
Locations:
Kakariko:	                  90%
Lost Woods:	75%
Lon Lon Ranch:	10%
Hyrule Field:	10%
Hyrule City:	10%
everything else:             0%

[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/33x7twh.jpg[/img]

Just extract the file with WinRAR or 7Zip, place the extracted concent into your Skyrim directory.
Activate the .esps and .esms in the Skyrim Launcher.

[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/aahbmx.jpg[/img]
Q: How can I get into the Lost Woods
A: Open the console in Skyrim and write: cow ZeldaLostWoods 0 0

Q: I have floating grass
A: Follow the steps from this website: http://www.creationkit.com/Floating_Grass_Fix

[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2uh6esz.jpg[/img]
This project can´t survive without your help, we really need more Modders for our Team. We search for:
Exterior/Interior designers
Scripters
Questdesigners
Model/ Texture creaters

[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2dls03o.jpg[/img]
To the ZREO Team, that allowed us to use there amazing Music
Visit there awesome Work on there Homepage:
http://www.zreomusic.com/

[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/fyn78i.jpg[/img]
